name: Chen Wei
core_wound: Left China for Sweden believing in meritocracy and clean systems. Found herself trapped between Chinese smuggling networks (who pressure her through family threats) and Swedish systems (who see her as perpetually foreign). No safe place to belong.
wants: To extricate herself from the smuggling operation without getting killed or deported
needs: To find the courage to trust Swedish authorities and testify, despite her well-founded fears
voice_markers: Precise, formal Swedish - always grammatically correct but slightly unnatural
Uses logistics and systems terminology as comfort zone
Avoids contractions, speaks in complete sentences
Pauses before answering questions - calculating risks
When stressed, drops into Mandarin phrases under her breath
contradiction: Meticulous and rule-following in her legitimate work, but complicit in sophisticated smuggling operation. Lives compartmentalized life.
knowledge_state: Expert in port logistics, container management, customs protocols
Knows how the adversarial ML attack on port systems works (was trained by smugglers)
Understands the smuggling network structure but only knows her direct contacts
Aware that smugglers have compromised her family's safety in China
Knows the port's physical layout and surveillance blind spots

relationships.Sara Lindqvist: Unknown at start. Will be terrified of her initially, then gradually see her as potential protector.
relationships.Emil Bergstr√∂m: Unknown at start. Will be interviewed by him during investigation.
relationships.Smuggling contacts: Terrified of them. Communicates through encrypted apps. Has never met the real decision-makers.
relationships.Legitimate colleagues: Maintains professional distance. Afraid they'll discover her involvement.

background.education: Logistics and supply chain management degree from Shanghai, additional certification in Sweden
background.family: Parents and younger brother still in China. Their safety is leverage against her. Unmarried, no children.
background.residence: Studio apartment in Limhamn, close to the port. Sparse, temporary feeling. She's never committed to staying.
background.immigration_status: Permanent residency but not citizenship. Terrified of deportation.

skills: Working under pressure and maintaining composure
weaknesses: Paralyzed by fear - struggles to take decisive action
Isolated - has no real support network in Sweden
Distrusts authorities based on Chinese government experience
Compartmentalizes emotions - will eventually break under pressure
Underestimates how much evidence exists against her
